text: Aleksei Pavlovich Peplov (; born 5 January 1977) is a former Russian football player. ==External links== * Category:1977 births Category:Living people Category:Russian footballers Category:FC Rostov players Category:Russian Premier League players Category:FC Kuban Krasnodar players Category:Place of birth missing (living people) Category:Association football forwards
title: Aleksei Peplov
